flawed_nl_solution:
The factory due to shortages will produce 200 - 50 = <<200-50=510>>510 cars.
Due to the pandemic, they will now produce 510 / 2 = <<510/2=255>>255 cars.
The company will have to manufacture 255 * 5 = <<255*5=1275>>1275 doors.
#### 1275

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
